description: Played an integral role in TÜV SÜD’s AI department, contributing to AI quality standards analysis, web application development, generative AI enhancements, and full‑stack development.
responsibilities: Studied and reviewed unreleased ISO AI quality standards; created comprehensive slide presentations for internal training
Developed, tested, and bug‑fixed the AI Readiness Analysis web application; designed and improved the user interface
Hosted and fine‑tuned Meta’s Llama 2 to generate industry‑specific evaluation questions for AI readiness
Managed project workflows in Microsoft Azure DevOps, including work items, user stories, timelines, and documentation
Implemented front‑end features with React.js and Next.js, and back‑end services with Node.js; secured authentication via OAuth

description: Advanced handwritten mathematical expression recognition (HMER) through a complexity‑driven model combination approach, incorporating multi‑GPU acceleration and real‑time symbol detection.
responsibilities: Conducted in‑depth analysis of state‑of‑the‑art HMER models and identified their limitations
Developed a complexity‑based model combination mechanism to dynamically apply the most effective pre‑trained model
Integrated YOLO for real‑time mathematical symbol detection and refined segmentation pipelines
Implemented multi‑GPU processing to accelerate deep learning architectures for faster recognition
Optimized model architectures to achieve a 65.21% recognition rate on the CROHME 2019 test dataset

description: Provided one‑on‑one mathematics tutoring to younger students, tailoring lessons to individual needs and significantly improving exam performance.
responsibilities: Designed and delivered customized lesson plans in algebra, geometry, and calculus
Prepared students for regular exams and high school entrance assessments
Assessed student progress and adapted teaching strategies accordingly
Helped students achieve A grades and secure placements in desired schools

description: Supported technical operations through hardware repair, custom server builds, client support, and maintenance documentation.
responsibilities: Diagnosed and repaired computer hardware components to ensure optimal functionality
Collaborated on building custom servers tailored to client requirements
Provided front‑office technical support and resolved client issues
Prepared detailed technical documentation and maintenance reports
Managed inventory of computer components and spare parts
Performed system upgrades and software installations

description: Maintained and secured local networks, mitigated malware incidents, and developed custom tools and web solutions to support business operations.
responsibilities: Performed regular network maintenance and troubleshooting to ensure uptime
Mitigated a malware outbreak by restoring systems from backups and securing endpoints
Installed and repaired network hardware across factory and administrative sites
Managed resource sharing and weekly backups for data continuity
Developed custom Excel tools for financial document analysis and reporting
Created a static website for the Bulgarian branch using PHP, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
